output_data.summary: Follow-up session detailing worsening symptoms of depression, including early morning awakening, anhedonia, and new passive suicidal ideation, resulting in an immediate medication dose adjustment.
output_data.reasoning: Patient presented with a clear history of escalating depressive symptoms (sleep disturbance, weight loss, work absence) despite a four-week trial of *Sertraline*. The encounter successfully addressed safety (screening out active intent) and executed a critical change in the psychopharmacology plan (dose increase from 50mg to 100mg), making this a high-priority medication management follow-up.
